name: notion-enhancer
description: an enhancer/customiser for the all-in-one productivity workspace notion.so

options.description: Opens the notion-enhancer menu from within Notion.
Loads the styling required for a theme to customise Notion's interface. Turning this off will disable all themes but may increase client performance.
Adds the styles from an uploaded .css file to Notion. Use this if you would like to customise the current theme or otherwise tweak Notion's appearance.
Activates built-in debugging tools accessible through the application menu.
